articles.author: Elmira Aliieva
articles.title: Elderly cruise passenger found dead after being abandoned on tropical island - NBC News
articles.description: The daughter of an elderly woman who died alone on a remote Australian island after her cruise ship left her behind is accusing the ship's crew of a “failure of care and common sense.”
articles.content:
The daughter of an elderly woman who died alone on a remote Australian island after her cruise ship left her behind is accusing the ship's crew of a failure of care and common sense.
